channel.title: Settlement Watch - Legal Settlement Feed
channel.description: Aggregated legal settlement discoveries from federal courts, state courts, and regulatory filings. Covering 15 state court systems and 94 federal districts.

item.title: [$8.9 Billion] Johnson & Johnson Talc Settlement
item.description:
Settlement for talc-related cancer claims in mass tort litigation involving thousands of plaintiffs.
Amount: $8.9 Billion Source: Class Action MDL Type: Mass Tort / Product Liability

item.title: [$6 Billion] 3M Military Earplug Settlement
item.description:
Settlement for defective combat earplugs affecting hundreds of thousands of military personnel.
Amount: $6 Billion Source: MDL 2885 (N.D. Florida) Type: Product Liability / Military

item.title: [$3.7 Billion] Wells Fargo Fake Accounts Settlement
item.description:
CFPB settlement for unauthorized account openings, improper fees, and consumer harm.
Amount: $3.7 Billion Source: CFPB Enforcement Type: Banking / Consumer Protection

item.title: [$1.2 Billion] Juul E-Cigarette Marketing Settlement
item.description:
Settlement with states over youth marketing practices for e-cigarettes.
Amount: $1.2 Billion Source: State Attorneys General Type: Consumer Protection / Marketing

item.title: [$725 Million] Facebook Privacy Settlement (Cambridge Analytica)
item.description:
Class action settlement over unauthorized data sharing with Cambridge Analytica.
Amount: $725 Million Source: Class Action (N.D. California) Type: Privacy / Data Protection

item.title: [$425 Million] Equifax Data Breach Settlement
item.description:
FTC settlement for 2017 data breach affecting 147 million consumers.
Amount: $425 Million Source: FTC Enforcement Type: Data Breach / Privacy

item.title: [$392 Million] Google Location Tracking Settlement
item.description:
Settlement with 40 state attorneys general over deceptive location tracking practices.
Amount: $392 Million Source: State AG Coalition Type: Privacy / Consumer Protection

item.title: [$350 Million] T-Mobile Data Breach Settlement
item.description:
Class action settlement for 2021 data breach affecting 76 million customers.
Amount: $350 Million Source: Class Action (W.D. Missouri) Type: Data Breach / Privacy

item.title: [$300 Million] Syngenta GMO Corn Settlement
item.description:
Settlement for farmers affected by GMO corn contamination and export disruptions.
Amount: $300 Million Source: MDL 2591 (D. Kansas) Type: Agriculture / Product Liability

item.title: [$230 Million] McKinsey Opioid Settlement
item.description:
Settlement with states over consulting work for opioid manufacturers.
Amount: $230 Million Source: State Attorneys General Type: Opioid / Consulting
